titles.title: Relating to the valuation of stock received by certain employees in connection with the performance of services as employees.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2128-2129)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/9/1993--Introduced. Provides for the valuation of certain stock issued to an employee on March 24, 1981, to determine the amount to be included in the gross income of such employee as property transferred in connection with the performance of services.
